title: Planning a Trip
description: Two friends discuss their vacation plans
transcript:
Anna: Hey, Mark! Are you going anywhere this summer?
Mark: Yes! I'm planning a trip to Spain.
Anna: That sounds amazing! When are you going?
Mark: I'm leaving on July 15th and coming back on July 25th.
Anna: Ten days! That's great. Where will you stay?
Mark: I booked a hotel near the beach in Barcelona. It wasn't expensive.
Anna: What are you going to do there?
Mark: I want to visit museums, try Spanish food, and swim in the sea. I'm also going to learn some Spanish words before I go.
Anna: Have a wonderful trip!

questions.question: Mark's hotel is far from the beach.
Mark wants to try Spanish food.
